caption.p: Determination of the true structure of Au-clusters using CSE ranking. Ratio of the correctly predicted S-atoms as a function of CSE for ligand-protected Au-clusters: a Au 34(SR) 22, b Au 36(SR) 24, c Au 38(SR) 24, d Au 44(SR) 26, e Au 52(SR) 32, f Au 92(SR) 44, g Au 102(SR) 44, h Au 146(SR) 57, and i Au 279(SR) 84. CSE includes contributions from error of local environments of Au and S atoms as well as from the number of predicted S atoms in units and in total
